title: Egalitarian democracy weighted by population
subtitle: Based on the expert assessments and index by V-Dem. It combines information on suffrage, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the extent to which the protection of rights, access to power, and distribution of resources is equal. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
sourceDesc: OWID based on V-Dem (v12), Gapminder (v6), HYDE (v3.2), and UN (2019).

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
